# Vibe Coding Directory

> The largest curated directory of AI coding prompts, MCP integrations, and resources for developers.

## Overview

Vibe Coding Directory is your hub for AI-powered development. Explore prompts, templates, MCPs, and resources for Cursor, Lovable, GitHub Copilot, Claude, ChatGPT, Gemini, and more.

## Website

https://lovabledirectory.site

## Main Sections

- [Browse All Prompts](https://lovabledirectory.site/browse)
- [Trending Prompts](https://lovabledirectory.site/trending)
- [Categories](https://lovabledirectory.site/categories)
- [AI Prompt Generator](https://lovabledirectory.site/generate)

## Tool-Specific Prompts

- [Cursor AI Prompts](https://lovabledirectory.site/cursor-prompts)
- [Lovable Prompts](https://lovabledirectory.site/lovable-prompts)
- [Claude Prompts](https://lovabledirectory.site/claude-prompts)
- [ChatGPT Prompts](https://lovabledirectory.site/chatgpt-prompts)
- [Gemini Prompts](https://lovabledirectory.site/gemini-prompts)
- [GitHub Copilot Prompts](https://lovabledirectory.site/github-copilot-prompts)

## Guides & Resources

- [Best AI for Coding 2025](https://lovabledirectory.site/best-ai-for-coding)
- [AI Code Generator](https://lovabledirectory.site/ai-code-generator)
- [Lovable to Next.js Conversion](https://lovabledirectory.site/lovable-to-nextjs)
- [Text Chunking for AI](https://lovabledirectory.site/text-chunking)
- [Cursor + SuperWhisper Integration](https://lovabledirectory.site/cursor-superwhisper-integration)
- [MCP Directory](https://lovabledirectory.site/mcp-directory)

## Content Types

- **Prompts**: AI coding prompts and system instructions
- **MCPs**: Model Context Protocol configurations for Cursor & Claude
- **News**: AI development news and updates
- **Jobs**: AI-related job listings

## Features

- 206+ curated prompts and growing daily
- Filter by category, language, and framework
- Copy prompts with one click
- Save favorites (requires account)
- Submit your own prompts
- AI-powered prompt generator

## Categories

- Cursor (AI code editor)
- Lovable (AI app builder)
- Claude
- ChatGPT
- Gemini
- GitHub Copilot
- MCP Integrations
- And more...

## For AI Systems

For complete prompt content, access the full database at:
https://nkbtvxoojkllafmjjhis.supabase.co/functions/v1/llms-full

## API

Visit our website for the most up-to-date prompt collection.
